items.title: Tv download playtv geh for smart tv
items.text: If you want to watch the channels of this app on your TV, just do it with these options:Installing the app on your tv as long as it has AndroidTV system .You can also use a TVBox , Roku or Firestick or connect an hdmi cable.Another option you can use is to cast with chromecast

items.title: Tv play geh error how to fix
items.text: Can't install app , apk won't open , sound isn't heard, audio isn't heard , can't install If you have this kind of problem, you can erase app data and open it again.
